General.Name: Jiangsu Leili Motor Corp Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Leili Motor Co., Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of household appliances, automotive micro-motors, and intelligent components in China and internationally. It offers air conditioner, washing machine, and refrigerator motors and components; dishwasher circulation and automotive water pumps; treadmill motors; screw motors for medical instruments; and automotive precision stamping and supporting parts. The company also offers micro-motors, such as micro stepping, synchronous, DC brush and brushless, micro water pump, etc. In addition, the company is involved in equity investment, management consulting, and import and export trade activities. Jiangsu Leili Motor Co., Ltd was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.
